summary: The 2024 Bad Blood was a wrestling event with matches featuring wrestlers from the Raw and SmackDown brands. It was the fourth Bad Blood event, taking place in Atlanta, Georgia, on October 5, 2024, 27 years after the first event. There were five matches, including a Hell in a Cell match between CM Punk and Drew McIntyre. The main event was a tag team match with Cody Rhodes and Roman Reigns defeating The Bloodline. The event also saw the return of popular wrestlers and special appearances by former champions and Hall of Famers. It was livestreamed and aired via pay-per-view, starting at 6:00 p.m. Eastern Time.
title: Bad Blood (2024)
